articles.author: Anna Cooban, CNN Business
articles.title: Europe is planning to ditch Russia's oil. Will it go after its gas? - CNN
articles.description: Europe has finally proposed a ban on Russian oil, but has again stopped short of using its most potent weapon — sanctioning Russia's natural gas.
